content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest possible price for this exceptional apartment in Duisburg city center, I must begin our discussion with a considerably high figure of 1200 Euros per month. However, I'm open to negotiation and adjustments depending on your preferences and circumstances. Do let me know if this starting point doesn't align with your budget expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Schmidt, I think 1200 Euros per month is too expensive for me. I am a student and I don't have a high income. I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price of 700 Euros falls significantly below my initial target, potentially jeopardizing my financial expectations from renting this apartment.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
